name: ZebPay
description: In the business of cryptocurrencies since the year 2014, ZebPay has served over 3 Million crypto users across the globe, and has enabled fiat transactions worth over $2 Billion on its robust web and mobile platforms.

As the torch bearers of liberating crypto from all shackles, ZebPay invites crypto enthusiasts from 162 countries across the globe to buy/sell crypto instantly & securely at the most competitive prices.
